text: 27.24: Lo 21.6-9 naŋga, Mt 27.4Kamatɨhu Pailat ŋgata, yandɨ kuyu maŋindarɨmandɨyu, naŋga saŋga aru yɨvurahɨmandɨ, vamba indarɨmi. Harɨm kuku nɨkɨrɨ mɨŋata krunavundindu tamɨŋgañɨ nuŋandɨ kuma ha ñɨmburɨmi. Kamata ambami, Kru nɨma kwɨmɨti ndahara yi pɨmɨ maŋgavɨrɨman. Kaŋandɨhin narɨŋandɨ vana, vami.
